Publication Title: Challenges in the implementation of ultrasensitive liquid biopsy approaches in precision oncology
scDemultiplex: An iterative beta-binomial model-based method for accurate demultiplexing with hashtag oligos
Publication Keywords: Beta-binomial, Single-cell Sequencing, Demultiplexing, Hashtag Oligo (Hto)
Publication Authors: Li-Ching Huang, Lindsey K Stolze, Hua-Chang Chen, Alexander Gelbard, Yu Shyr, Qi Liu, Quanhu Sheng
Publication Abstract: Single-cell sequencing have been widely used to characterize cellular heterogeneity. Sample multiplexing where multiple samples are pooled together for single-cell experiments, attracts wide attention due to its benefits of increasing capacity, reducing costs, and minimizing batch effects.
